--- Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:

> ::Lord Jhiaxus::
>    
>   Jhiaxus draws some energon shackles from subspace and binds Hot
> Rod's hands behind his back. He also gags him for when the the
> effects of Hydras' shot wear off. Finally Jhiaxus attaches a signal
> masker to Hot Rod's back, under the right side of his fender.
>
>   Jhiaxus: Centuries of being a damn hero are about to catch up with
> you, Auto-fool!

Myrmidon watches the confrontation with a great deal of interest, his
optics narrowing curiously. Hot Rod falling this easily seemed almost
disappointing. With a slight movement he continued to survey the area,
wondering, almost hoping, that Hot Rod had some back up comming. After
all, only a fool would go out without alerting his 'friends' that he
was going into danger. 

Preston
(Myrmidon)
